title: bronze 3 player looking for a good duo partner.
body: Hey man im looking for a duo partner that will play some ranked with me. Im trying to get out of this elo give me a add

replies.body: i dont need anyone to teach me im pretty good. i just need a duo partner for life
I can teach you but I won't duo lol. Give a man a fish he eats for a day, teach a man to fish he eats forwver
